CheckedOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream.Description: Creates an output stream with the specified Checksum.

Parameters: int: the byte to be written
Throws: if an I/O error has occurred
write(int).Description: Writes a byte. Will block until the byte is actually written.

ClassDesc: An output stream that also maintains a checksum of the data being written. The checksum can then be used to verify the integrity of the output data.
